topics.title: Describe Your Favorite Animal
topics.prompt: Talk about your favorite animal and explain why you like it.
topics.hint: 請說出你喜歡的動物，並說明喜歡的理由。大約3～5句。
topics.sample: My favorite animal is the elephant. I like it because it is very big and strong. Elephants are also very smart animals. I think they are wonderful creatures.

topics.title: Describe an Animal Search
topics.prompt: Imagine you are looking for an animal. Describe what animals you searched for and what you found or did not find.
topics.hint: 描述你尋找動物的過程，有哪些動物找不到，哪些有找到。3～5句。
topics.sample: I looked for a frog and a dolphin, but I could not find them. Then I saw an elephant near the river. It was very exciting to find the elephant.

topics.title: Talk About a Time You Didn’t Find Something
topics.prompt: Describe a time when you were looking for something but did not find it.
topics.hint: 分享你尋找某樣東西但沒找到的經驗，可以是任何東西。3～5句。
topics.sample: One day, I wanted to find my lost keys. I looked in many places but I could not find them. It made me feel a little frustrated. Finally, my friend helped me find them.

topics.title: Describe a Fun Exploration
topics.prompt: Tell a story about a fun exploration or adventure you had.
topics.hint: 講述一次你覺得有趣的冒險經驗，可以是校外教學或旅遊。3～5句。
topics.sample: Last summer, I went to a forest with my family. We looked for different animals and plants. It was fun because we saw many birds and even found a small frog.

topics.title: Express Your Feelings When You Find Something
topics.prompt: Describe how you feel when you find something you have been looking for.
topics.hint: 說說尋找東西時找到後的感覺，可以包含開心、驚喜等情緒。3～5句。
topics.sample: When I found the lost book, I felt very happy and relieved. It was like a big surprise. Finding things after searching makes me excited.

topics.title: Talk About Animals You Have Seen
topics.prompt: Describe some animals you have seen in real life and where you saw them.
topics.hint: 分享你看過的動物種類和地點，例如動物園、公園、農場等。3～5句。
topics.sample: I have seen elephants at the zoo. I also saw ducks at the park near my house. Last year, I visited a farm and saw many chickens and cows.

topics.title: Imagine Being an Explorer
topics.prompt: Imagine you are an explorer. Describe what you would like to explore and why.
topics.hint: 以探險家的身分，說說你想探索的地方或事物及原因。3～5句。
topics.sample: If I were an explorer, I would like to explore the jungle. I want to see wild animals and learn about plants. It would be exciting to discover new things.

topics.title: Talk About Your Favorite Toys
topics.prompt: Describe your favorite toy and explain why you like it.
topics.hint: 介紹你最喜歡的玩具，並說明原因。3～5句。
topics.sample: My favorite toy is a small robot. I like it because it can move and make sounds. I play with it every day and it makes me happy.

topics.title: Describe What Makes You Laugh
topics.prompt: Talk about something that makes you laugh or smile.
topics.hint: 說說什麼事情會讓你開心或笑出來，可以是朋友、遊戲或故事。3～5句。
topics.sample: My friends make me laugh when they tell funny jokes. Sometimes, I laugh when I watch cartoons. Laughing makes me feel good and happy.

topics.title: Share a Story About Finding Nothing
topics.prompt: Tell a short story about a time you looked for something but found nothing.
topics.hint: 分享一次尋找東西卻一無所獲的經驗，描述當時的情況和感受。3～5句。
topics.sample: Once, I tried to find my old toys in the box. But I found nothing because my toys were lost. I felt a little sad but also learned to keep my things organized.
